about_the_game:
Show the Airborne Archipelago you’re at the top of your game with the Temcard Brag emote and Top Tamer cosmetic pack. Let the world know you mean business with the Suit Up emote and Stylish Suit cosmetic pack.

Emotes:
Temcard brag
Suit up

Top Tamer cosmetic pack:
Top Tamer cap
Top Tamer outfit
Top Tamer rucksack

Stylish Suit cosmetic pack:
Swanky jacket
Snazzy trousers
detailed_description:
Show the Airborne Archipelago you’re at the top of your game with the Temcard Brag emote and Top Tamer cosmetic pack. Let the world know you mean business with the Suit Up emote and Stylish Suit cosmetic pack.

Emotes:
Temcard brag
Suit up

Top Tamer cosmetic pack:
Top Tamer cap

Stylish Suit cosmetic pack:

name: Temtem - Deluxe Edition Upgrade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bits
  • Processor: Celeron G530 2.4Ghz or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 650M or similar
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum requirements for playing at 720p@30fps
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bits
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100T 3.2Ghz or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or similar
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended requirements for playing at 1080p@60fps

short_description: Show the Airborne Archipelago you’re at the top of your game with the Temcard Brag emote and Top Tamer cosmetic pack. Let the world know you mean business with the Suit Up emote and Stylish Suit cosmetic pack.
supported_languages:
English, French, German, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
